body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28348](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28348) (build: Bump g++ minimum supported version to 10 by MarcoFalke)
* [#28211](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28211) (Bump python minimum supported version to 3.9 by MarcoFalke)
* [#26022](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26022) (Add util::ResultPtr class by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
(Draft for now because CI will likely fail)
This fails on `macOS 11.0`, according to CI. So I guess this can be closed for now.

> This fails on macOS 11.0,

Yea, this'll at least need to wait for the macOS compiler bump, but the next time that happens (soon) it will be from 11 to 16, if not 17.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
If you want pull in https://github.com/fanquake/bitcoin/commit/fc8f7ae32dc16526fe2f155422781bfbc7e9f326, should be enough for green macOS cross-compile CI. Tested once locally.
Happy to rebase on that, once and if it is merged. I think it is better to keep the changes here to CI/doc-only.
CI should be all green on next rebase.
